IRPact_modellierung.distributions

Class StandardTriangularDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.Distribution
      • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.UnivariateDistribution
        • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.ContinuousDistribution
          • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.COLTContinuousDistribution
            • IRPact_modellierung.distributions.StandardTriangularDistribution

  • public class StandardTriangularDistribution
extends COLTContinuousDistribution
    Class that represents a standard triangular distribution (in (-1,1)), taken from the COLT library. Distribution has it triangular shape and support in (-1,1)

      StandardTriangularDistribution(java.lang.String name)
